text:
Hi <@U064QG589CY>
Thank you for the reply
My question was regarding REST request sent from HubSpot.
I try to send POST request from Workflows -> Action - > Custom Code and receive 403 Forbidden from my service. I would like to enlist HubSpot IPs as I can't just open service to all the IPs for security reasons
Do you know, who can help me with this issue?
